pre.expressions.pre.expressions: $L.license={"Change Management", "Computer Telephony", "Desktop Administration", "Distributed Services", "Incident Management", "Configuration Management", "IR Expert", "RAD Compiler", "RAD Runtime", "Request Management", "Asset Contract Management", "Problem Management", "SC2000", "SC3270", "SCAuto/AIM MVS", "SCAuto/ERP Connection", "SCAuto/JAM MVS", "SCAuto/Lotus Notes", "SCAuto/MAPIMail", "SCAuto/Netview (AIX/NT)", "SCAuto/Netview OS/390", "SCAuto/OpenView/Network Node Manager (NNM)", "SCAuto/OpenView/Operations (ITO/VPO)", "SCAuto/Remedy ARS", "SCAuto/SDK OS/390", "SCAuto/SDK Unix", "SCAuto/SDK Windows", "SCAuto/SMS", "SCAuto/SPECTRUM", "SCAuto/SunNet", "SCAuto/Tally NetCensus", "SCAuto/Tivoli", "SCAuto/Unicenter AMO", "SCAuto/Unicenter TNG", "SCAuto/UNIXmail", "Scheduled Maintenance", "Service Desk", "SLA", "SOAP API", "Work Management", "Knowledge Management", "Knowledge Management ESS", "Service Catalog", "Change Calendar"}
for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.license) do (if lioption($L.i in $L.license) then ($L.installed=$L.installed+{$L.i in $L.license}))
